casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

February, 1975

(February 21, 1975) In the Matter of C. James Lombardi, Jr., Appellant, v. Paul J. Regan, as Chairman of the Board of Parole, et al., Respondents. (Appeal No. 1.)

Appeal unanimously dismissed (see People ex rel. Wilder v. Markley, 26 N Y 2d 648). (Appeal from judgment of Cayuga Special Term denying application for show cause order and dismissing proceeding on the merits.) Present — Moule, J. P., Cardamone, Simons, Mahoney and Goldman, JJ.
